attributes.action: issue every individual whose information was held on the lost HMRC discs to be issued a new NI number within six months of the discs being lost
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To better prevent identity theft of both parents and their children and ensure that individuals identity is not used at a later date the government should issue new NI numbers. 
There can be no guarantee that the data has not been copied and thus all efforts must be made to secure the future integrity of our data

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
